description: This file declares the API for the Sys Repository Driver Object, including creation, removal, enrollment, and initialization functions. It provides prototypes for exported functions in the system environment, serving as an interface for other modules.

methods.name: SysCreateRepositoryDriver
methods.description: Creates a repository driver object with context handles.

methods.name: SysRdoCreate
methods.description: Creates an instance of the Sys Repository Driver Object.

methods.name: SysRdoRemove
methods.description: Removes the Sys Repository Driver Object instance.

methods.name: SysRdoEnrollObjects
methods.description: Enrolls necessary objects into the Sys Repository Driver Object.

methods.name: SysRdoInitialize
methods.description: Initializes the Sys Repository Driver Object.
